name:
My Steam Deck is lookin‚Äô good. In addition to some awesome AAA titles (Spider-Man, Horizon, Uncharted, Cyberpunk), I have emulation dialed in from Sega Master System, NES, Genesis, SNES, Sega CD, Saturn, Dreamcast, PSP, GBA, NDS, 3DS, N64, PS1, PS2, PS3, Wii, WiiU, and even Switch.

One of my favorite tech gadgets in ages. Just amazing.
